r.d: Great software requires collaboration and communication. Fit is a tool for enhancing collaboration in software development. It's an invaluable way to collaborate on complicated problems--and get them right--early in development. Fit allows customers, testers, and programmers to learn what their software should do and what it does do. It automatically compares customers' expectations to actual results.
r.n: Changes V 0.2.1 - added missing Type Filter: "Boolean" - fix4d swapped lines in Node Changes V 0.2.0 - ranemed to Testing_FIT - removed frontend code Changes V 0.1.0 - DOM a like parser to work with HTML tables - Implements main fixtures: Primitive, Action and Column - Example custom fixtures and test cases - API examples for CLI and Web usage
